article:
Water was rare in a small village. A poor farmer had to bring water from a distant  _  for his family. He hung two pots to the ends of a strong stick. He filled them with water from the river and  _  to his house. Soon he  _  that there was a hole in one of the pots and water was dripping out continually.  _  it was difficult to buy a new one, he continued to use the two pots.
One day, a friend discovered the  _  and asked the farmer, "Why didn't you replace the leaking pot by a good one?"
The wise farmer drew his attention to the side of the path  _  by the leaking pot. There was a long way full of flowering plants on that side of the path. The farmer  _  that he had been hanging the leaking pot to the same side of the path every day. The flowers are being used to  _  the church in the village. He sells a lot of flowers for money. Thus the water that leaked from the pot has provided beauty and  _  .
Every person has unique features which are often considered as shortcomings. But these special qualities may turn out to be  _  . Looking at the weaknesses we may feel  _  . But no one is perfect. There is something good in everyone. Let us learn to  _  the variety and diversity among individuals.
